titles: An answer to the late K. James's last declaration, dated at St. Germains, April 17. s.n. 1693
author: Welwood, James, 1652-1727.
Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to James Wellwood. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Also attributed to Daniel Defoe. cf. Moore, J.R. : A checklist of the writings of Daniel Defoe.
keywords: James --  II, --  King of England, 1633-1701. --  His Majesties most gratious declaration to all his loving subjects, 17 April 1693.
